titleStmt.title: A use of exhortation to the London apprentices or, A second message after their petition.
titleStmt.author: J. E.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Young-men where are you now; what fast asleep? ..."
Wing E17 suggests that this may have been printed in London and has title "A use of the exhortation ...".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
